item.description:
The movie version of the last Harry Potter book, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows, is actually TWO movies. This is the first one. It opens on November 19, so let's try to see it on opening weekend. How about a meetup on Saturday, November 20?

I checked the showtimes at moviefone.com. Showcase is showing Harry Potter at 7:00. Let's meet in the lobby at about 6:30. Feel free to call my cell phone (508-981-0455) if you'll be late, or if you can't find us.

- David
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my photo - Not Josey Wales. The organizer photo.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
